column5: Does anyone know of a place near hamilton that sells rain gear in large sizes 3xl 4xl? I have looked all over and cant find a thing that fits. thanks

If you are looking for summer weight rain gear I would highly recommend getting Frog Toggs fisherman series. I needed a 3X so that I could also wear my fishing vest UNDER my rain gear (I used to hate having all the gear in the vest get wet) whenever it rained.  I ordered my set off ebay for under 30.00 Canadian total but that was back when the dollar was strong. I don't know where you can get them locally in 3X as bass pro only goes up to 2X on the website. Cabelas in the U.S. does sell them in 4X
have you tried Home Depot?  I don't know how big they go but I got a decent set there.
Marks work warehouse!!!  good selection of product in store. I see 3x and 4xl there often. Usually back in against the work clothes
tarp and duck tape...its what my dad used when I was a kid.  Ya he was cheap!
Getting ready for the inevitable Quinte downpour, eh Pat ??  See you in a few weeks
yeah i want to be ready for the worst but im hoping we will get lucky.(weather that is) Thanks for all the responses gents i will try marks.
